variable.name: cOptions
variable.description: A. Vital Status. Contacted and alive [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: rOptions
variable.description: A. Vital Status. Reported and alive [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: dOptions
variable.description: A. Vital Status. Reported deceased [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: resultCode
variable.description: K. Administrative Information. Q36. Final screening result code [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: maritalStatus
variable.description: J. Other Items. Q31. Which of the following describes your current marital status? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: inptHosp
variable.description: E. Overnight Admissions. Q10. Have you stayed overnight as a patient in a hospital for any other reason since our last contact? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: outptHosp
variable.description: Were you admitted to an emergency room or a medical facility for outpatient treatment since our last contact?

variable.name: outptHospHeart
variable.description: Was this related to a heart problem or difficulty breathing?

variable.name: nursingEver
variable.description: E. Overnight Admission. Q11a. Since our last contact, have you stayed overnight as a patient in a nursing home? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: nursingCurrent
variable.description: E. Overnight Admission. Q11b. Are you currently staying in a nursing home? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: cigaretteSmoke
variable.description: J. Other Items. Q30. Do you now smoke cigarettes? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: employmentStatus
variable.description: L. Employment Status. Q32. Which of the following best describes your employment status? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: employedStatus
variable.description: L. Employment Status. Q32b. Which of these two categories best describes your 'employed' status? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: unemployedStatus
variable.description: L. Employment Status. Q32c. Which of these two categories best describes your 'unemployed' status? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: retiredStatus
variable.description: L. Employment Status. Q32d. Which of these two categories best describes your 'retired' status? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: healthPerception
variable.description: C. General Health. Q6. Over the past year, compared to other people your age, would you say your health has been excellent, good, fair, or poor? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxHeavy
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q23. Are you able to do heavy work around the house, like shoveling snow or washing windows, walls, or floors without help? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxStairs
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q24. Are you able to walk up and down stairs without help? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxWalk
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q25. Are you able to walk half a mile without help? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxWork
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q26a. Are you ABLE to go to work? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxWorkHeart
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q26b. Is a heart problem the main cause of your not being able to work? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxWorkMiss
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q27a. During the past 4 weeks, have you missed work for at least half a day because of your health? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxWorkMissDays
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q27b. On how many days has this happened? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxActivities
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q28a. Are you able to do your usual activities, such at work around the house or recreation? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxActivitiesHeart
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q28b. Is a heart problem the main cause of your being unable to do these activities? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxActivitiesCut
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q29a. During the past 4 weeks, have you had to cut down on your usual activities, such as work around the house or recreation, for half a day or more because of your health? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: fxActivitiesCutDays
variable.description: I. Functional Status. Q29b. On how many days has this happened? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: HFmedsAFU

variable.description: H. Interview. Q16b. Did you take any medication for high blood cholesterol in the past two weeks? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: aspirinMedsAFU
variable.description: H. Interview. Q17. Are you now taking aspirin or a medicine containing aspirin on a regular basis? This does not include Tylenol nor Advil. [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: asthmaMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for asthma in the past two weeks?

variable.name: lungMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for chronic bronchitis or emphysema in the past two weeks?

variable.name: rhythmMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for abnormal heart rhythm in the past two weeks?

variable.name: bloodMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for blood thinning in the past two weeks?

variable.name: strokeMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for stroke in the past two weeks?

variable.name: TIAmedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for mini-stroke or TIA in the past two weeks?

variable.name: claudMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for leg pain while walking or claudication in the past two weeks?

variable.name: depressMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for depression in the past two weeks?

variable.name: painMedsAFU
variable.description: Do you regularly take medicine for pain or inflammation that does NOT contain aspirin?

variable.name: anginaMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for chest pain or angina in the past two weeks?

variable.name: heartMedsAFU
variable.description: Did you take any medication for other heart conditions in the past two weeks?

variable.name: medsReport
variable.description: Does the participant have medications to report?

variable.name: chronicLungEver
variable.description: C. General Health. Q7g. Has a doctor said that you have chronic lung disease such as bronchitis or emphysema? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: chronicLungLastCntct
variable.description: Since our last contact, has a doctor said that you have chronic lung disease such as bronchitis or emphysema?

variable.name: breathingWake
variable.description: Are there times when you wake up at night because of difficulty breathing?

variable.name: breathingHurrying
variable.description: Do you have trouble breathing or shortness of breath when hurrying on the level?

variable.name: breathingWalking
variable.description: Do you have trouble breathing or shortness of breath when walking at ordinary pace on a level surface?

variable.name: breathingStopPace
variable.description: Do you stop for breath when walking at your own pace?

variable.name: breathingStopYards
variable.description: Do you stop for breath after walking 100 yards on the level?

variable.name: breathingWalkSlow
variable.description: Do you have to walk slower than people of your own age on a level surface because of shortness of breath?

variable.name: breathingNotWalking
variable.description: Do you have difficulty breathing when you are not walking or active?

variable.name: breathingCoughing
variable.description: Do you usually have some coughing or wheezing?

variable.name: asthmaEver
variable.description: C. General Health. Q7h. Has a doctor said that you have asthma? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: asthmaLastCntct
variable.description: Since our last contact, has a doctor said that you have asthma?

variable.name: strokeLastCntct

variable.description: Were you hospitalized for this stroke, slight stroke, transient ischemic attack, or TIA?

variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had angina, angina pectoris, or chest pain due to heart disease?

variable.name: cardiacSurgeryYN
variable.description: C. General Health. Q12a. Since our last contact, have you had surgery on your heart or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: cardiacSurgeryBypass

variable.name: cardiacAngio
variable.description: G. Invasive Procedures. Q14a. Since our last contact, have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.description: Did you have a CT or MRI of the head in the past year? If yes, why? (Codes)

variable.description: Did you have catheterization or an angiogram in the past year?

variable.description: Was it to look at the blood vessels in your kidneys? What was the reason?

variable.description: Was it to look at the blood vessels in your legs? What was the reason?

variable.name: HFever
variable.description: C. General Health. Q7b. Has a doctor said that you have heart failure or congestive heart failure? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: HFhospEver
variable.description: Have you been hospitalized for heart failure?

variable.name: HFlastCntct
variable.description: Since our last contact, has a doctor said that you had heart failure or congestive heart failure?

variable.name: HFhospLastCntct
variable.description: Were you hospitalized for heart failure at that time?

variable.name: HFweakEver
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that your heart is weak, does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs?

variable.name: HFweakHosp
variable.description: Were you hospitalized for the weak heart muscle at that time?

variable.name: HFweakLastCntct
variable.description: Since our last contact, has a doctor said that your heart is weak, does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs?

variable.name: HFcough
variable.description: Do you frequently cough at night (in the absence of a cold or 'flu')?

variable.name: HFpillows
variable.description: Do you sleep on 2 or more pillows to improve your breathing?

variable.name: HFdoctor
variable.description: Have you seen a doctor or health care professional for any of these symptoms in the past year?

variable.name: atrialFib
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you had an irregular heart beat called atrial fibrillation or atrial fibrillation on a heart scan or electrocardiogram tracing?

variable.name: swellingFeet
variable.description: Do you often have swelling in your feet or ankles at the end of the day?

variable.name: swellingGone
variable.description: Is the swelling in your feet or ankles gone in the morning?

variable.name: PADpain
variable.description: Do you have pain in your legs caused by a blockage of the arteries?

variable.name: PADever
variable.description: Has a doctor ever said that you have peripheral vascular disease or intermittent claudication?

variable.name: cancerEver
variable.description: C. General Health. Q7i. Has a doctor said that you have cancer? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: cancerLastCntct
variable.description: Since we last contacted you, has a doctor said you have cancer?

variable.name: cancerSecond
variable.description: C. General Health. Q7l. Have you had another cancer? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: hormoneFirstYN
variable.description: H. Interview. Q19a. Since our last contact, have you taken or used any female hormone pills, skin patches, shots, or implants? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: hormoneSecondYN
variable.description: H. Interview. Q21. Have you also used a second female hormone since we last contacted you? [Annual Follow-Up Questionnaire Form, Version A]

variable.name: healthcareDentist
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a dentist?

variable.name: healthcareDoctor
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a doctor or health professional for routine physical exam or general check-up?

variable.name: healthcareChiro
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a chiropractor?

variable.name: healthcareAcupunct
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a person who uses acupuncture?

variable.name: healthcareFaith
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a faith healer?

variable.name: healthcareRoots
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a person who deals with roots or herbs?

variable.name: healthcareAstrology
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a person who practices astrology or reads zodiac signs?

variable.name: healthcareTea
variable.description: In the past year, have you seen a person who reads tea leaves, roots, or palms?

variable.name: healthcareDoctorNumber
variable.description: How many times in the past year did you go to a doctor's or nurse practitioner's office to get care for yourself?

variable.name: insuranceCoverage
variable.description: Are you currently covered by one or more health insurance programs that pays most or all of your health care expenses?

variable.name: insuranceCoverageLapseTime
variable.description: How long has it been since you had health insurance coverage?

variable.name: insurancePrivate
variable.description: Are you currently covered by a private health insurance?

variable.name: insuranceMedicaid
variable.description: Are you currently covered by Medicaid or public aid?

variable.name: insuranceMedicare
variable.description: Are you currently covered by Medicare?

variable.name: insuranceVeteran
variable.description: Are you currently covered by the Veterans Administration, CHAMPUS, or TRICARE?

variable.name: insuranceOther
variable.description: Are you currently covered by another means of insurance?

variable.name: insuranceCoverageLapseYN
variable.description: Has there been a time in the past year when you did not have health insurance coverage?

variable.name: insuranceMeds
variable.description: Do you have health insurance that helps you pay for your medications?

variable.name: insuranceMedsNoLimits
variable.description: My medication insurance has no limits on my medication coverage

variable.name: insuranceMedsCut
variable.description: Since our last contact, have you experienced a cut in benefits?

variable.name: insuranceMedsNumber
variable.description: How many medications can you obtain?

variable.name: insuranceMedsFillLimit
variable.description: My medication insurance limits how often I can fill my prescriptions

variable.name: insuranceMedsTimeLimit
variable.description: What is the time limit for filling your prescriptions?

variable.name: insuranceMedsCostLimit
variable.description: My medication insurance has a dollar limit per month

variable.name: insuranceMedsLimitAmt
variable.description: My medication insurance has a dollar limit per month. How much is the dollar limit?

variable.name: insuranceMedsNumberLimit
variable.description: My medication insurance limits the number of medications it will pay for per month or quarter

variable.name: insuranceMedsOtherLimits
variable.description: Are there other limits to your medication insurance plan?

variable.name: costIncreasePremiums
variable.description: Since our last contact, have you experienced an increase in the price of premiums?

variable.name: costIncreaseShare
variable.description: Since our last contact, have you experienced an increase in your share of the medical costs?

variable.name: costMedsAverage
variable.description: On average, how much do you pay each month for your medication?

variable.name: costMedsCopay
variable.description: Do you pay a co-payment when you fill your medication?

variable.name: costSacrificeHealthcare
variable.description: Has there been a time in the past year when you went without needed health care because of costs?

variable.name: costSacrificeMeds
variable.description: I did not fill a prescription due to cost

variable.name: costSacrificeSpecialist
variable.description: I did not see a specialist when needed due to cost

variable.name: costSacrificeTreatment
variable.description: I skipped a medical test, treatment, or follow-up due to cost

variable.name: costSacrificeDoctor
variable.description: I had medical problems, but did not see a doctor or nurse practitioner due to cost

variable.name: costProblem
variable.description: In the past year, how much of a problem has it been to get the health care, medical tests, or treatment that you or your doctor believed necessary?

variable.name: satisfactionListen
variable.description: How often did your doctor or other health care providers listen carefully to you?

variable.name: satisfactionExplain
variable.description: How often did your doctor or other health providers explain things in a way you could understand?

variable.name: satisfactionRespect
variable.description: How often did your doctor or other health care providers show respect for what you had to say?

variable.name: satisfactionTime
variable.description: How often did your doctor or other health care providers spend enough time with you?

variable.name: satisfactionQuality
variable.description: Overall, how satisfied have you been with the quality of health care you have received in the past year?

variable.name: satisfactionConfident
variable.description: How confident are you that you can get high quality health care when you need it?

variable.name: stressPastYear
variable.description: How much stress have you experienced over the past year?

variable.name: depressedPastYear
variable.description: How often have you felt sad or depressed over the past year?

variable.name: nervousPastYear
variable.description: How often have you felt nervous or tense over the past year?

variable.name: discriminationPastYear
variable.description: How often have you felt you were treated unfairly or discriminated against over the past year?

variable.name: stressCopePastYear
variable.description: How well have you handled or coped with stressors you experienced over the past year?

variable.name: supportPastYear
variable.description: How satisfied are you with the help or support that you've received from others over the past year?
